name: SceneUnderstandingComponent
desc: A component that maps features of the physical environment.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a component that makes an entity aware of certain aspects of the physical environment.

items.name: init(entityType: SceneUnderstandingComponent.EntityType?)
items.desc: Creates a component for the given entity type that makes an entity aware of certain aspects of the physical environment.

items.name: var entityType: SceneUnderstandingComponent.EntityType?
items.desc: The type of real-world object that the component models.

items.name: enum SceneUnderstandingComponent.EntityType
items.desc: Types of real-world object that a scene-understanding component models.

items.name: static func registerComponent()
items.desc: Provides the framework with your app's intent to use a custom component.
